title: Need Help ASAP: Logo Typefaces (2)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Slide1_3961.jpg)

Can anyone identify the two typefaces that are used here? Not sure if "Metal Container Corporation" is a serif or sans serif due to the quality.

Thanks in advance!

Font: 

 CG Triplett Light, Helvetica Neue 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120621/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: oki3169

comments.content:
The "Metal Container..." must be **[CG Triplett Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120621/http:/www.identifont.com/show?41C)** by Monotype (Miles Inc. 1992), probably a bit emboldened

For the subtitle, **[Helvetica Neue (Extended)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120621/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Helvetica%20Neue%20-%20Extended&fid=a8e8547208de95c99548b51ccc383dbc&fsize=36&text=ONE%20OF%20THE%20ANHEUSER-BUSCH%20COMPA&wrap=2)** could be a good substitute
